name: retrain_1
description: Retrains a dataset and updates a model. Use this API call when you want to update a model and keep the model ID instead of creating a new model.

algorithm.description: Specifies the algorithm used to train the dataset. Optional. Use this parameter only when training a dataset with a type of image-detection. Valid values are object-detection-v1 and retail-execution.

epochs.description: Number of training iterations for the neural network. Optional.

learningRate.description: Specifies how much the gradient affects the optimization of the model at each time step. Optional.

modelId.description: ID of the model to be updated from the training.

V2VisionTrainParams.description: JSON that contains parameters that specify how the model is created

trainSplitRatio.description: Lets you specify the ratio of data used to train the dataset and the data used to test the model.

withFeedback.description: Lets you specify that feedback examples are included in the data to be trained to create the model.

withGlobalDatasetId.description: Lets you specify that a global dataset is used in addition to the specified dataset to create the model.

$ul: **algorithm**: Algorithm used to create the model. Returned only when the modelType is image-detection.
**createdAt**: Date and time that the model was created.
**datasetId**: ID of the dataset trained to create the model.
**epochs**: Number of epochs used during training.
**failureMsg**: Reason the dataset training failed. Returned only if the training status is FAILED.
**language**: Model language inherited from the dataset language. For image datasets, default is N/A. For text datasets, default is en_US.
**modelId**: ID of the model. Contains letters and numbers.
**modelType**: Type of data from which the model was created.
**object**: Object returned; in this case, training.
**progress**: How far the dataset training has progressed. Values are between 0ï¿½1.
**queuePosition**: Where the training job is in the queue. This field appears in the response only if the status is QUEUED.
**trainParams**: Training parameters passed into the request.
**trainStats**: Returns null when you train a dataset. Training statistics are returned when the status is SUCCEEDED or FAILED.
**updatedAt**: Date and time that the model was last updated.
